name: Rollerbuster
description:
"A filibuster? Are you duking on my chest right now?"

Rollerbuster is a Word Association infinite runner.......on roller skates.

 Can you stay on topic?

Press  [F3] to change between windowed/full screen

-----

UPDATE:

fixed the retry bug. Rety to your hearts content

-----

Made for TV Game Jam 2019

Based on Season 6 episode 6 of Parks and Recreation: Filibuster (Episode 5 on Netflix)
